Think about how many times you've heard these familiar phrases until today:You've had the computer for hours. It's my turn!It's your turn to take out the trash, I did it last time!You said you'd walk the dog today!I turned off the lights last night; it's your turn tonight.No, not burgers again. Let's try something new!And how do you settle these decisions? By playing the same old rock-paper-scissors? We have a better idea! Enter 12 MiniBattles! This online 2-player game allows you to resolve any debate in minutes. You'll play a random game among 42 mini-games, each testing different skills: speed, button-bashing, accuracy, timing, and precision. And if you think it's unfair because one of you has more gaming skills, think again! Because no one can master them all!Every game is quick, 1v1, and controlled with just one button. Ready to settle the score once and for all? This is the game for you!
